email.subject: Java / Full Stack Developer | 5 YOE | Open to Full-Time / W2 / Contract
email.body:
Hi Team,

I hope you're doing well. I’m currently exploring new opportunities in the U.S. market and wanted to reach out.

I am a Java / Full Stack Developer with 5 years of experience building scalable backend systems and enterprise applications using Spring Boot, REST APIs, microservices, AWS, and modern frontend technologies when required.

I am open to Full-Time, W2, or Contract roles across Java Backend or Full Stack development.

I’ve attached my resume for your review and would appreciate the opportunity to connect if there’s a suitable fit.


Best regards,
Narayana Rao Mahendrakar
+1-989-621-7183
mahendrakarnarayan7@gmail.com
